Mulambo187, thanks for the upload.  Like most Islam-related posts this one seems to have drawn the lesser-educated out of the woodwork, again.  Not altogether their fault, though.  The weak-minded will most always fear the things they don't understand.  And those who don't will likely have those same fears successfully pounded into them by the corporate media they are enslaved to.  It's a shame, really.  The other posters on this thread most likely sleep with a night light, and are terror-stricken that bin Laden's face is around every corner.  Kind of sad in a somewhat pathetic way, I guess, but given the serious shortage of real citizens in this country it's understandable.  A genuine citizen takes the time to educate him/her self and refuses to fall prey to the govt/media propaganda machine.  All other persons are not real citizens - merely civilians - who will always be allowed to exist as long as they are productive and obedient in some way to the master's rule; ie; work 8 hours, go home, sit on the couch and listen to the media and believe everything they say, no matter how incredible, then get up in the AM and repeat the process - all without ever making waves or asking questions.
